name: Moss Public Relations
tag_list: public-relations, pr, communications, consulting, brand-management, marketing, buzz, press, media, outlets
overview:
Moss Public Relations delivers strategic PR campaigns for corporations and businesses in the US and globally. They leverage relationships and experience to get the word out to targeted audiences through appropriate media outlets.

Moss PR clients range from small fashion retailers to multi-national technology companies. The firm’s boutique size allows them to give clients one-on-one service and personal commitment to individual growth.

The Moss PR team is comprised of seasoned professionals who each bring their own distinctive contributions and offer media contacts in various markets and areas. Their strength lies in their ability to listen to clients and tailor unique PR campaigns to meet their individual markets, needs and motivations. The Moss dynamic team works side by side with clients to maximize exposure and return on investment. Moss PR’s mission is to continually execute smart, cost-effective and innovative ways to spotlight their client’s brand and/or product.
